description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1kq9m","text":"Filtering and preparing P. bursaria cultures for downstream RNAi","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":24,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4jo5d","text":"Use an old culture of Paramecium bursaria (between one and six months old). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":22,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9chlg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2m5r2","text":"# This is to ensure that cultures start from a vegetative growth stage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98a5m","text":"In a sterile flow hood, filter 100mL of P. bursaria culture through a 40um cell strainer (3x). Keep the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1roq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"847pb","text":"# This removes large clumps and debris from the culture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6epua","text":"# Remain in hood for the remainder of the protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6n9hr","text":"Transfer P. bursaria to a fresh culture flask and leave for 1-2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anok3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c92u","text":"# This allows cells to digest any residual food present in the food vacuole","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"usqu","text":"Aliquot 5uL onto a slide and count cells (x10).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r99q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fomg","text":"# This is to ensure the correct volume and cell number (~50 cells per well) is added","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pb1e","text":"Pour P. bursaria into a sterile square petri dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77c4m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2m9im","text":"# Place the lid of the petri dish under one side so that the petri dish is at an angle ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50k43","text":"Using a multi-channel pipette, aliquot the calculated volume of P. bursaria into each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":64,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4u6jl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5luve","text":"# The final cell number should be ~50 cell per well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jneo","text":"# Shake the petri dish gently with your hand (two to three times), and then aliquot as quickly as possible","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chqqj","text":"# Try not to pipette back and forth in the petri dish, as this can push the cells to the edge and create an uneven distribution of cells across the wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hnbk","text":"Top up to 250uL per well with NCL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ruge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5khnh","text":"# Autoclaved NCL with antibiotics added in the flow hood under sterile conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fngi5","text":"# Ampicillin ( ), IPTG ( ), and β-sitosterol ( )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","concentration":"0.1","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"865AF94F4FAD11EDACF00A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","concentration":"0.4","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"865AF9DD4FAD11EDACF00A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","concentration":"0.0008","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"865AFA5B4FAD11EDACF00A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3h5u9","text":"Add a lid to the plate and place at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6r2s7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35k3t","text":"# Or whatever condition required for the experiment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v9dt","text":"# Under standard conditions, ensure the plate is exposed to adequate light","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E4B8BC70A0AA11EDADC763E609DE13FE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"23","unit":10}}}}

title: Paramecium cultures for RNAi
